name: MONSTER JUMP (Android Game)
description:
Monster Land was a quiet and happy village, where small and friendly monsters lived.

But one day, the evil Toritus along with his henchmen, decided to conquer all the lands.

THESE LANDS ARE FREE AND NO FLAG WILL BE TAXED!!!

Collect all the flags of the wicked and jump until you get where Toritus lives, at the top of the mountains next to the volcanoes, to end him.

Game produced by PCNONOGames Dedicated to all children and especially my nieces
Marina, Laura, Valentina and my daughter Carla.

@PCNONOGames 2020
